[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@spaceagetv/electron-progress-window](./electron-progress-window.md) &gt; [ProgressWindow](./electron-progress-window.progresswindow.md) &gt; [addItem](./electron-progress-window.progresswindow.additem.md)

## ProgressWindow.addItem() method

Add a new item to the default ProgressWindow instance. If the window is not yet created, it will be created.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static addItem(options?: Partial<ProgressItemOptions>): Promise<ProgressItem>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | Partial&lt;[ProgressItemOptions](./electron-progress-window.progressitemoptions.md)<!-- -->&gt; | _(Optional)_ options for the new item |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ProgressItem](./electron-progress-window.progressitem.md)<!-- -->&gt;

a promise that resolves to the new ProgressItem. Use the returned item to update the progress, or change the title or detail.
